scripts.build: yarn run build:types && yarn run build:app
scripts.build:app: yarn run clear:ts && webpack --config webpack.config.cjs --env production
scripts.build:types: yarn ts-for-gir generate Gtk-3.0 Pango-1.0 WebKit2-4.0 -e node --moduleType esm --useNamespace
scripts.clear: yarn run clear:ts && yarn run clear:types
scripts.start: yarn run clear && yarn run build && yarn run start:app
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:types && yarn run validate:app
